title: pbe

embed.description: The Public Beta Environment (PBE) is a limited-access public League of Legends realm where players help us test "declassified" features, content and experiments that aren't yet (and may never be) ready for prime time.

replies.body: feelsbadman, been playing this game since idk when lol but never got into pbe haha

Dude it's quite a selective progress you have to have a clean record and need to play with a lot of people (a lot of the things they test are social based such as chat, summoner profile searching etc.)

So if you recently afked a bunch or got reported then you prob won't get it. They want people who try to uphold the summoners code and can reliably and calmly give good feed back such that they can make changes for the better. (and let's face it no one's gonna want you if you're a toxic and angry person).
